example.code:
Amazon.S3.Model.ObjectLockConfiguration = Get-S3ObjectLockConfiguration -BucketName 's3buckettesting' PS /Users/testuser/S3> Amazon.S3.Model.ObjectLockConfiguration.ObjectLockEnabled
Value ----- Enabled
PS /Users/testuser/S3> Amazon.S3.Model.ObjectLockConfiguration.Rule.DefaultRetention
Days Mode Years ---- ---- ----- 1 GOVERNANCE 0
example.description: This command returns an object with details about the Object lock configuration of the given S3 bucket.
